org.usfirst.frc.team1719.robot.interfaces

Interface IPositionTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericSubsystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PositionLogic, PositionPhysical

    public interface IPositionTracker
extends GenericSubsystem
    Actuator-void subsystem used for tracking the position on the field. Position (0,0) at heading 0 is the starting position of the robot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getHeading() 
      double getX() 
      double getY() 
      boolean isTrustworhty() 
      void reset(double x, double y)
      Reset the Positioning System to a known good location
      void update()
      Called every iteration to update the tracker's perception of the position of the robot.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.usfirst.frc.team1719.robot.interfaces.GenericSubsystem

        disable

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update()
        Called every iteration to update the tracker's perception of the position of the robot.

      • getX

        double getX()
        Returns:
        the current x (right-left axis from starting position) position of the robot

      • getY

        double getY()
        Returns:
        the current y (fore-aft axis from starting position) position of the robot

      • reset

        void reset(double x,
           double y)
        Reset the Positioning System to a known good location
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -

      • getHeading

        double getHeading()
        Returns:
        the current heading of the robot (in degrees away from starting orientation)

      • isTrustworhty

        boolean isTrustworhty()
        Returns:
        whether or not the robot thinks the position reported is trustworthy
